abstract: United Nations Security Council raises concerns over potential war crimes committed in Yemen by Saudi-led military offensive, which is supported by United States.
lead_paragraph: A U.N. session intended to draw attention to the dire effects of the war also raised questions about potential crimes committed by a Saudi-led military offensive that the Pentagon actively supports.

headline.main: Saudi-Led War in Yemen Frays Ties With the U.S.
headline.print_headline: Saudi-Led War in Yemen Frays Ties With the U.S.

snippet: A U.N. session intended to draw attention to the dire effects of the war also raised questions about potential crimes committed by a Saudi-led military offensive that the Pentagon actively supports.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
